definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你还担心，测试下水质，或者买个纯净水过滤器。

sentences.english: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.chinese: 添加正确的水量和组装的过滤器。

sentences.english: Filters for fuel oil, lube oil, hydraulic power line oil, cutting oil.
sentences.chinese: 用于燃油，润滑油，液压油切削油的过滤器。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is discharged from the bottom of the tank and passes to the filters.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油可自槽底放出进入过滤器。

sentences.english: The sludge concentration has a significant impact on membrane filtration resistance.
sentences.chinese: 污泥浓度对膜过滤阻力上升速率影响显著。

sentences.english: This kind of water kettle is very practical because water can be drunk directly after its filtration.
sentences.chinese: 这种矿泉壶很实用，用它过滤后，水就可以直接喝了。

sentences.english: So, collaboratively filter and recommend or die?
sentences.chinese: 那么，协同过滤和推荐会消失？

sentences.english: The method can be used to reduce the noise of projections and filter non-white noise.
sentences.chinese: 该方法能降低投影数据的噪声，而且能过滤非白噪声。

sentences.english: Such a clarification network is characterl to a advantageous body.
sentences.chinese: 这样一种过滤网对一个健康的身体是必要的。

sentences.english: Water from these areas historically needed no filtering.
sentences.chinese: 在历史上，来自这些地区的水不需要过滤。

sentences.english: Provide a connection for hooking up to a portable filtration unit.
sentences.chinese: 提供一个连接到一个便携式猎艳过滤装置。

sentences.english: A membrane filtrating technology for coal- sluicing wastewater at coal-fired power plants is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种处理燃煤电厂冲煤废水的膜式过滤技术。

sentences.english: The strainer screen should be serviced at least twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 过滤器的过滤网一年至少要维护两次。

sentences.english: The strainer screen should be serviced at least twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 过滤器的过滤网一年至少要维护两次。

sentences.english: It's suitable for heatable filter paper as packaging material.
sentences.chinese: 包装材料适用于可热封过滤绵纸的。

sentences.english: User-driven organization and filtering are not just nice to have.
sentences.chinese: 提供以用户为驱动的组织和过滤机制。

definition: to screen or filter out/to winnow (agriculture)
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
